comments.body: NumPY should consider adding these to the official API maybe.  @sturlamolden wrote these.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@
cdef extern from "src/aligned_malloc/aligned_malloc.h":
    cdef void *PyArray_realloc_aligned(void *p, size_t n)
    cdef void *PyArray_malloc_aligned(size_t n)
    cdef void *PyArray_calloc_aligned(size_t n, size_t s)

comments.body: The original is what is in 1.17 and will also be in 1.18 after the C-API changes go in.

        void *state
